body:
I made the following change to `libpng`:
```python
list_url = "https://sourceforge.net/projects/libpng/files/"
list_depth = 3
```
When I run `spack versions` I see:
```
$ spack versions libpng
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  1.6.27  1.2.57
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  Found no versions for libpng
$ spack versions libpng
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  1.6.27  1.2.57
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  1.5.29beta01
$ spack versions libpng
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  1.6.27  1.2.57
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  1.6.29  1.6.28
$ spack versions libpng
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  1.6.27  1.2.57
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  1.0.67-no-config  1.0.67  1.0.66-no-config  1.0.66
```
title: Non-deterministic output from spack versions
